alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillsboro Beach, or 7 miles east of Lighthouse Point, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Lake Worth, Lighthouse Point, Palm Beach, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Hillsboro Beach and Sea Ranch Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
